name: Course Import
description: Import course layouts from KML/GeoJSON/GPX files to define surfaces like greens, tees, fairways, and rough.

prd.problemStatement: Course mapping requires digitizing physical layouts. Supporting standard GIS formats enables quick import from Google Earth and other tools.
goals: Import KML, GeoJSON, and GPX files
userStories: As a superintendent, I want to import KML files so that I can quickly digitize my course
As a superintendent, I want surface types detected so that I don't have to manually categorize each area
